crops.name: Apple Blotch
crops.description: Apple blotch is a fungal disease that causes dark, irregular spots on apple leaves and fruit. It can lead to reduced fruit quality and premature leaf drop.

crops.name: Apple Scab
crops.description: Apple scab is a fungal disease that causes dark, sunken lesions on leaves, fruit, and stems. It reduces fruit yield and quality.

crops.name: Apple Healthy Apple
crops.description: Healthy apple trees are free from diseases and pests. They have robust foliage, fruit, and stems.

crops.name: Apple Rotten Apple
crops.description: Rotten apples are affected by various diseases or storage issues, causing decay and a mushy texture.

crops.name: Corn (Maize) Ear Rot
crops.description: Ear rot is caused by fungi that infect corn ears, leading to kernel discoloration, mold growth, and reduced quality.

crops.name: Corn (Maize) Fall Armyworm
crops.description: Fall armyworm is a pest that damages corn by feeding on leaves and ears, causing reduced yield and plant health.

crops.name: Corn (Maize) Healthy Corn (Maize)
crops.description: Healthy corn plants have strong, vigorous growth and produce high-quality ears of corn.

crops.name: Corn (Maize) Stem Borer
crops.description: Stem borer is a pest that burrows into the corn stalk, weakening the plant and potentially leading to lodging and reduced yield.

crops.name: Grapes Healthy Grapes
crops.description: Healthy grapevines exhibit vigorous growth, robust leaves, and high-quality fruit.

crops.name: Potato Healthy Potato
crops.description: Healthy potato plants have strong, green foliage and produce high-quality tubers.

crops.name: Potato Rotten Potato
crops.description: Rotten potatoes are affected by diseases or improper storage, leading to decay and an unappetizing appearance.

crops.name: Strawberry Healthy Strawberry or Pickable Strawberry
crops.description: Healthy or pickable strawberries are ripe and suitable for consumption, exhibiting vibrant color and firmness.

crops.name: Strawberry Rotten Strawberry
crops.description: Rotten strawberries are overripe or affected by diseases, leading to mushy texture and discoloration.

crops.name: Strawberry Unpickable Strawberry
crops.description: Unpickable strawberries are either under-ripe or affected by pests/diseases, making them unsuitable for consumption.

crops.name: Tomato Ripe Tomato or Healthy Tomato
crops.description: Ripe or healthy tomatoes are fully developed and suitable for consumption, with a firm texture and vibrant color.

crops.name: Tomato Rotten Tomato
crops.description: Rotten tomatoes are affected by diseases or improper handling, causing decay and an unappealing texture.
